name: TheTopFloor
tag_list: pr, communications, public-relations, technology-public-relations, technology-pr, freelance-pr, start-up-pr, affordable-pr, digital-pr, digital, press-release, media-relations, tech-pr, micheledlewis, fx, forex
overview:
The Top Floor is a freelance PR consultancy based in the northwest England which specialises in the technology, finance and e-commerce sectors.

The company is headed by Michele McDermott-Fox (formerly Lewis), a senior public relations professional who has delivered on a diverse range of briefs in the UK, Europe and MENA.

The company has worked with a wide range of UK and international private, public and third sector oragnisations with businesses across aviation, finance, retail sales force automation technology, FX trading platforms, virtual makeover technology, and numerous e-commerce businesses - from start-up to established global brands.

Member Chartered Institute of Public Relations.
